ActBank Act
Cooperative Credit Associations Act
Trust and Loan Companies Act
SubjectAccess to Funds Regulations
PrecisACCESS TO FUNDS REGULATIONS in order to reduce the maximum cheque hold period for retail depositors and small and medium sized enterprises and provide retail depositors with timelier access to the first $100 deposited by cheque. The Cheque Holding Policy Disclosure Regulations are repealed with the coming into force of these regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0024 Publication Date: 2012-03-14
